name: Life Domain
description: The Life domain focuses on vibrant positive energy and healing.

1.name: Disciple of Life
1.description: Healing spells of 1st level or higher restore extra hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Preserve Life
2.description: Use Channel Divinity to distribute healing equal to five times your cleric level among creatures within 30 feet, up to half their maximum hit points.

6.name: Blessed Healer
6.description: When you heal others with a spell of 1st level or higher, you also regain hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns, deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage on a weapon attack (2d8 at 14th level).

17.name: Supreme Healing
17.description: When you roll dice to restore hit points, use the highest number possible for each die.

choices.name: Life Domain Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Life Domain subclass
